verbs.description: so much more than a condiment ketchup calls for celebration like many americans [ARG1: i] [V: grew] up [ARGM-MNR: on ketchup] i smeared it on eggs puddled it next to potatoes and glazed frozen chicken patties with the stuff but as i crossed over to adulthood i got a sense that requesting ketchup at restaurants suggested something about me beyond my preferred sauce i understood that unlike worldlier condiments such as sriracha ketchup is not sophisticated richard landau kate jacoby heinz andrew wood philadelphia united states thousand island new york tribune andrew f smith andrew f smith ketchup
